comment.author: 111718387@N06
comment._content: This is a copy of Berthault and Prieur's engraving which was published in the Tableaux Historiques de la révolution française. The BNF catalogue dates it to 1802 but the print was part of a collection delivered between 1793 and 1796 according to La Révolution par la gravure : les ‘Tableaux historiques de la Révolution française’, une entreprise éditoriale d’information et sa diffusion en Europe, 1791–1817, ed. C. Hould (Paris, 2002), 236. I discuss it over at French History of March 2012 fh.oxfordjournals.org/content/early/2012/01/19/fh.crr099....
